languages.text: Беженцы павшего улья трудятся в поте лица, чтобы оправдать оказанную им честь служения. Набранная из них прислуга с особым тщанием следит, чтобы экипировка Вольного Торговца была в безупречном состоянии.

Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.
languages.original_text: Беженцы павшего улья трудятся в поте лица, чтобы оправдать оказанную им честь служения. Набранная из них прислуга с особым тщанием следит, чтобы экипировка Вольного Торговца была в безупречном состоянии.

Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

languages.text: Des réfugiés de la ruche détruite s'échinent sans relâche pour prouver qu'ils méritent l'honneur de servir le protectorat. Ces serviteurs sont à présent chargés de maintenir l'équipement {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en parfait état et ils s'acquittent de leur tâche avec un zèle infatigable.
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

traits.locale_text: Des réfugiés de la ruche détruite s'échinent sans relâche pour prouver qu'ils méritent l'honneur de servir le protectorat.

languages.text: 崩壊したハイヴからの難民たちは、保護国家に仕える名誉に値することを証明するため、休むことなく労働に励む。 この使用人たちは、ローグトレーダーの装備を完璧な状態に維持するよう命じられており、丹念に手入れをしている。
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

traits.locale_text: 崩壊したハイヴからの難民たちは、保護国家に仕える名誉に値することを証明するため、休むことなく労働に励む。

languages.text: 陨落巢都的幸存者夜以继日地辛勤工作，极力证明自己对贸易王朝的价值。如今，这些仆人的任务是保养行商浪人的军备，使其始终处于最佳状态。他们为了这个目标不辞辛苦地劳作。
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

traits.locale_text: 陨落巢都的幸存者夜以继日地辛勤工作，极力证明自己对贸易王朝的价值。

languages.text: Los refugiados de la colmena caída trabajan sin descanso para demostrar que merecen el honor de servir al protectorado. A estos sirvientes se les ha encomendado cuidar del equipo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, tarea que acometen con sumo cuidado.
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

traits.locale_text: Los refugiados de la colmena caída trabajan sin descanso para demostrar que merecen el honor de servir al protectorado.

languages.text: Flüchtlinge aus der gefallenen Makropole schuften unermüdlich, um zu beweisen, dass sie die Ehre verdienen, dem Protektorat zu dienen. Diese Diener haben nun die Aufgabe erhalten, die Ausrüstung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in perfektem Zustand zu halten, und kümmern sich mit großem Eifer darum.
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.

traits.locale_text: Flüchtlinge aus der gefallenen Makropole schuften unermüdlich, um zu beweisen, dass sie die Ehre verdienen, dem Protektorat zu dienen.

languages.text: Yıkılan kovandan gelen mülteciler, protektoraya hizmet etme şerefini hak ettiklerini kanıtlamak için gece gündüz demeden çalışıyorlar. Şimdi de aralarından bazıları, Hür Tacir'in ekipmanının bakımını yapmakla görevlendirildi ve bu vazifelerini büyük titizlikle yerine getiriyorlar.
languages.original_text: Refugees from the fallen hive toil without rest to prove that they deserve the honour of serving the protectorate. These servants have now been tasked with maintaining the Rogue Trader's equipment in perfect condition, and they do so with painstaking care.
